ValidationRule.description: Ensuring new DCC values are selected if 'Total Processed Value' is entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(Total_Processed_Value__c)), OR( ISBLANK(Eligible_DCC_Value__c), ISBLANK(Opt_in__c), ISBLANK(Markup__c), ISBLANK(Rebate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To calculate the DCC values, you must enter: Total Processed Value, Eligible DCC Value %, Opt-in %, Markup % and Rebate %
